===I get an error message "_Side-by-side configuration is incorrect_" or "_MSVCR90.DLL is missing_" when I try to start the application. ===

You need to download and install the [http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?familyid=A5C84275-3B97-4AB7-A40D-3802B2AF5FC2&displaylang=en Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)] (for the 32 bit version) or [http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?familyid=ba9257ca-337f-4b40-8c14-157cfdffee4e&displaylang=en Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1 Redistributable Package (x64)] (for the 64 bit version) from Microsoft.
